docs.lead_paragraph: New York State's strict new drug law, which has been in effect for 10 months, seems to have been tough on a few small-time operators, but there is evidence that it has done little to impede narcotics traffic or to diminish the availability of hard drugs in the metropolitan area.
docs.abstract: rev of Fed revenue sharing program notes Conn will receive $79.7-million, increase of $4.5-million from '73 (S)
